moves.name: Knock Off
moves.description: The user slaps down the target's held item, preventing that item from being used in the battle.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: An earsplitting screech harshly reduces the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Night Shade
moves.description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage matching the user's level.

moves.name: Spite
moves.description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

moves.name: Will-O-Wisp
moves.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

moves.name: Shadow Sneak
moves.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

moves.name: Feint Attack
moves.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. It hits without fail.

moves.name: Hex
moves.description: This relentless attack does massive damage to a target affected by status problems.

moves.name: Shadow Ball
moves.description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Sucker Punch
moves.description: This move enables the user to attack first. It fails if the target is not readying an attack, however.

moves.name: Embargo
moves.description: It prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

moves.name: Snatch
moves.description: The user steals the effects of any healing or stat-changing move the opponent attempts to use.

moves.name: Grudge
moves.description: If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent's move that knocked it out.

moves.name: Trick
moves.description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.
